column4: For tasks assigned to EA (and ideally same as personal to-do list); not company's project management SaaS
OpenPhone is provided by Athena to ensure EAs can make international phone calls on your behalf.
E.g. use urgent only for VIPs
E.g. use for everything except flights
E.g. create separate virtual card for new vendors
Transfers to most airlines & hotels; use for any points-based flight or hotel searches
Not loyal; will go to any brand if better price/location/amenities
